name: The Lost Soul (keeelay)
description:
You play a soul possessing various objects throughout the game. 

Click on the object you are currently possessing and drag out to possess other objects. 

Solve interesting puzzles by strategically possessing different objects. 

Press Tab to open the options menu. 

This was created over the course of 8 days by these people:
Programmers: Kyle He, Victor Li
Artists: Sriya Pratipati, Grace Tan
Sound Designer: Arnold Gao
